entry.title: Preorder Pikmin 4 For Just $49 With This Exclusive Promo Code
entry.content:
You can preorder Pikmin 4 for just $49 from Super Shop (normally $60). Pikmin 4 preorders are already discounted to $55 on Super Shop, but using the GameSpot exclusive promo code GMSPTPIK at checkout drops the price down to $49.
Saving $11 on your Pikmin 4 preorder at Super Shop is a great deal, but there is one caveat: unlike preorders from some other retailers, you won't receive your order on release day (July 21). Luckily, Super Shop offers fast and free shipping, and all orders will be shipped on launch day--so you won't have to wait very long to start playing.
If you know you won't be able to wait an extra day or two, our Pikmin 4 preorder guide details all the ways you can buy your copy of the game before launch. Of course, you’ll have to pay full price, but that extra cash may be worth it to some.
Preorders for The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom are also discounted at Super Shop, dropping the game to just $60 (normally $70). Similarly, digital buyers can save $30 if they buy both Pikmin 4 and Zelda using Nintendo eShop vouchers.

詳細句子文法解析：

1. "Preorders for The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom are also discounted at Super Shop, dropping the game to just $60 (normally $70)."
這個句子中， "are also discounted" 是被動語態的現在式，用來描述 Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom 的現況。 "Dropping" 則是現在進行式，用來描述價錢正在往下調。

2. "If you know you won't be able to wait an extra day or two, our Pikmin 4 preorder guide details all the ways you can buy your copy of the game before launch."
這個句子中，"If you know" 是引導假設語氣的子句，前提條件是你知道自己等不了幾天。 "Details" 則是用來描述指南中包含哪些內容。

3. "Super Shop offers fast and free shipping, and all orders will be shipped on launch day--so you won't have to wait very long to start playing."
這個句子中， "offers" 是現在式，用來描述 Super Shop 提供的服務。 "Will be shipped" 是被動語態的未來式，用來來描述訂單會在上架當天被發送。

4. "Saving $11 on your Pikmin 4 preorder at Super Shop is a great deal, but there is one caveat..."
這個句子中， "Saving" 是進行式，用來描述節省的動作正在進行。 "Is (...) a great deal" 是一個口語和銷售語氣的用法，用來描述這個優惠多麼的好。 "Caveat" 則是一個專業性的用語，用來指一個附帶條件，翻成中文是「注意事項」。

5. "unlike preorders from some other retailers, you won't receive your order on release day."
這個句子中， "unlike" 是一個比較用詞，用來指對比其他平台的預購方式。 "Won't receive" 是否定的未來式，加入了對照意味。

單字：

1. preorder (預購)
將商品在正式上市前預先購買

2. promo code (促銷代碼)
解鎖特定優惠的只限定顧客使用的獨家密碼

3. discount (折扣)
商品贍加出售並更便宜

4. eShop vouchers (電子商店禮券)
用來購買數位內容的數碼儲值券

5. release day (上市日)
商品正式發售日期

6. caveat (注意事項)
專有名詞，指附帶條件或所擁有異常

7. retailer (零售商)
專賣商品的商家

8. shipping (發貨/運輸)
將物品運送到某地或某處的過程

9. fast (快速的)
花費很少的時間

10. discount (折扣)
比賣價更低的價格

片語：

1. full price (標價)
商品的原價

2. before launch (在上市之前)
在正式發售前

3. pay full price (全額支付)
不享有任何優惠價位，依據商品標示的價格支付

4. launch day (發行日)
商品正式上市的日期

備註：

1. "Preorder" 的中文是「預購」，單字應該可以依照發音做聯想，例如: 預售廣告（pre-order ad）。

2. 「最高級」這個文法可以用在單字及片語追加 y・ier・est 等形式表達。例如剛剛提到過的 full price，最高級會變成 fullst，但這個形式幾乎不會使用。

3. 相似片語：同等等級（on par），附加條件（additional terms and conditions）。反義片語：毫無優惠（no discount），遲交費用（late fee）。
